arts.ttl: Dean Henderson deserves the plaudits just as much as Ismaila Sarr after Palace enjoy Brighton away day

Crystal Palace boss Oliver Glasner praises his side for their "efficient" 3-1 win over Brighton & Hove Albion.

arts.ttl: Yannick Bolasie singles out two Crystal Palace players for praise after stunning 3-1 derby win over Brighton
Brighton conceded goals too easily - Hurzeler
arts.sum: Brighton & Hove Albion head coach Fabian Hurzeler says his side conceded goals "too easily" in their 3-1 defeat to Crystal Palace in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Sarr double sees Palace down Brighton in rivalry
arts.sum: Crystal Palace winger Ismaila Sarr scored a brace as his side beat arch-rivals Brighton & Hove Albion 3-1 at the Amex Stadium on Sunday, handing the Seagulls their first home defeat in the Premier League this season.

arts.sum: Dean Henderson says he felt ‚Äòunbeatable‚Äô as Crystal Palace secured a ‚Äòmassive‚Äô win at fierce rivals Brighton. Palace extended their unbeaten run to five Premier League games after an impressive 3-1 victory at the Amex Stadium. Ismaila Sarr scored twice and created another as the Eagles climbed four points clear of the relegation places.
